posts.title: A Journey into Assembly Language
posts.description: An exploration of low-level programming with practical examples in ARM64 and x86-64 for security research.

posts.title: HackTheBox Write-up: The Needle
posts.description: A firmware analysis challenge involving ARM boot executable reverse engineering and credential extraction.

posts.title: HackTheBox Write-up: RFlag
posts.description: A radio frequency challenge involving complex signal analysis using rtl_433 to decode .cf32 files.

posts.title: QSSTV Challenge: Slow-Scan Television Decoding
posts.description: A radio challenge involving slow-scan television (SSTV) signal decoding using QSSTV software.

posts.title: HackTheBox Write-up: Trace
posts.description: A hardware challenge involving GPIO signal analysis from a Raspberry Pi to reverse engineer an 8x8 LED matrix display.

posts.title: HackTheBox Write-up: Low Logic
posts.description: A detailed walkthrough of the 'Low Logic' hardware challenge from HackTheBox, involving reverse engineering a digital logic circuit.
